Major AI Developments.title: Rajasthan rolls out AI-enabled ‘My Career Advisor’ app for students
Major AI Developments.summary: Rajasthan has launched the 'My Career Advisor' app, an AI-enabled mobile platform providing personalized career guidance to students in Classes 9-12. The app aligns student choices with the National Education Policy 2020 through assessments based on aptitude, interest, and skills. The platform aims to offer tailored guidance to students, helping them make informed career decisions.
